title: Grape
keywords: A grape bunch, as cut from the vine and used to make wine. Depicted as red (purple-colored) grapes.

title: Melon
keywords: A melon fruit in a light greenish-brown rind. Depicted as a cantaloupe by most platforms, but can resemble a honeydew at a distance.

title: WaterMelon
keywords: A slice of watermelon, showing its rich pink flesh, black seeds, and green rind.

title: Tangerine
keywords: An orange-colored citrus fruit with a green leaf or leaves and stem.

title: Lemon
keywords: The sour, yellow-colored citrus fruit of the lemon, usually with a stem and green leaf or leaves.

title: Banana
keywords: A ripe banana, peeled and ready to eat on major platforms. Great snack for a child or monkey

title: Pineapple
keywords: The tropical fruit of a pineapple, shown in spiky, golden-brown skin and with a pointed, green crown

title: Mango
keywords: The ripe fruit of a tropical mango. Variously depicted in shades of yellow, red, orange, and green with a single, green leaf and stem.

title: Red Apple
keywords: A classic red apple, shown with a stem and single, green leaf on major platforms

title: Green Apple
keywords: A common green apple, tarter counterpart to the Red Apple. Displayed with a stem and single, green leaf on major platforms.

title: Pear
keywords: A light-green variety of a common pear, shown with a stem and sometimes green leaf.

title: Peach
keywords: The fleshy, pinkish-orange fruit of the fuzzy peach, shown with green leaves and sometimes a stem.

title: Cherries
keywords: Two rich red cherries with a green leaf and joined at their long stems

title: Strawberry
keywords: The fruit of a rich red strawberry dotted with seeds and crowned with green leaves

title: Kiwi Fruit
keywords: A kiwifruit, or Chinese gooseberry, with its fuzzy, brown skin sliced open to show its light-green flesh, white core, and black seeds.

title: Tomato
keywords: A plump, red garden tomato topped with a leafy green stem

title: coconut
keywords: The hairy shell of a tropical coconut, cracked in a half to show its milky-white meat.

title: Carrot
keywords: A whole, bright orange carrot, topped with long green leaves, as if freshly plucked from the garden

title: Ear of Corn
keywords: An ear of corn, or maize, partially husked to show its buttery-yellow kernels.

title: Avacado
keywords: A pear-shaped avocado, sliced in half to show its yellow-green flesh and large brown pit
